personalInfo.name: Sajal Basnet
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
personalInfo.summary: Results-driven full-stack developer with hands-on experience building responsive apps and optimising cloud systems. Masters in Software Development graduate from Swinburne University (GPA 3.688/4.0, Golden Key International Honour Society - Top 15%). Currently focused on AI, development, security, and support. Eager to contribute technical expertise and problem-solving skills to deliver high-impact software solutions in a dynamic team.
personalInfo.elevator_pitch: I'm Sajal Basnet â€” a full-stack developer from Nepal based in Auburn, Sydney. I recently completed my Masters in Software Development at Swinburne (Top 15%) and have hands-on experience as a Software Developer Intern at Aubot and VR Developer at edgedVR. I'm passionate about AI, cloud optimization, and building practical solutions. Currently working on a Digital Twin Portfolio app with chat and voice features using React, Python, and AI technologies.

projects.name: DevOps Cost Optimizer
projects.situation: AWS infrastructure costs spiraling beyond budget with 40% over-provisioned resources, manual monitoring consuming 15+ hours weekly, lack of visibility for stakeholders leading to reactive rather than predictive cost management
projects.task: Design and implement automated cost optimization system with real-time monitoring, predictive analytics, and stakeholder reporting to achieve 25-30% cost reduction while maintaining performance standards

action.technical_implementation: Developed Python-based resource analysis engine with Terraform automation, integrated AWS Cost Explorer APIs, built Grafana dashboards with Prometheus metrics collection, implemented lifecycle policies for automated resource management
action.architecture_decisions: Created modular terraform modules for reusability, designed event-driven cost monitoring with CloudWatch integration, implemented CI/CD pipeline for infrastructure changes
action.collaboration: Worked independently with stakeholder consultation, documented architecture decisions, created user training materials

result.cost_savings: Achieved 30% reduction in AWS infrastructure costs (~$18,000 annual savings on $60,000 budget)
result.time_savings: Reduced manual monitoring from 15+ hours to 2 hours per week
result.operational_improvements: 99.9% system uptime maintained during optimization, predictive cost modeling enabled 6-month budget planning accuracy
result.stakeholder_value: Delivered executive dashboards providing real-time cost visibility, enabling data-driven infrastructure decisions
result.scalability: System designed to handle 10x infrastructure growth without performance degradation

challenges_overcome: Balancing cost optimization with performance requirements - solved through gradual right-sizing with rollback capabilities
Complex AWS billing data integration - resolved through custom API wrappers and data normalization
Non-technical stakeholder communication - addressed through intuitive dashboard design and regular demos
projects.business_impact: Enabled sustainable infrastructure scaling while reducing operational overhead, providing foundation for future growth without cost explosion

links.documentation: Comprehensive technical documentation and user guides available

projects.lessons_learned: Importance of stakeholder communication in technical projects, value of modular architecture for maintainability, need for comprehensive monitoring in cost optimization

projects.name: Marketplace Bidding System
projects.situation: University capstone project requiring secure e-commerce platform supporting real-time bidding for 1000+ concurrent users, with zero tolerance for security vulnerabilities, data breaches, or bidding integrity issues
projects.task: Lead 6-person team to develop full-stack auction platform with secure payment processing, real-time bidding engine, comprehensive user management, and robust concurrency handling within 12-week academic timeline

action.technical_leadership: Designed secure architecture with parameterized queries, role-based access control, encrypted data handling, and real-time WebSocket communication for bidding
action.development: Implemented PHP backend with MySQL database, JavaScript/Ajax frontend, integrated secure payment gateway, built comprehensive admin dashboard
action.security_implementation: Conducted security audits, implemented input validation, SQL injection prevention, CSRF protection, and secure session management
action.team_coordination: Managed 6-person team using agile methodology, conducted code reviews, coordinated integration testing, managed version control workflows

result.technical_achievements: Delivered platform handling 1000+ concurrent bidding sessions with 99.9% uptime during testing phases
result.security_outcomes: Zero security vulnerabilities identified in academic security assessment, achieved 100% input validation coverage
result.performance_metrics: Sub-200ms bid processing time, real-time state synchronization across all connected users
result.academic_success: Project received Distinction grade (85%+), recognized for technical complexity and implementation quality
result.business_functionality: Complete marketplace with user registration, product listings, real-time auctions, payment processing, and administrative controls

challenges_overcome: Real-time bidding concurrency - solved through database locking mechanisms and optimistic concurrency control
Payment security integration - addressed through PCI-compliant payment gateway integration and tokenization
Team coordination across different skill levels - managed through clear role definition, mentoring, and regular check-ins
Performance under load - optimized through database indexing, query optimization, and efficient state management
projects.business_impact: Demonstrated capability to deliver enterprise-grade e-commerce solutions with security and performance at scale

links.documentation: Academic project documentation and security assessment reports available
links.demo: Live demonstration available for qualified interviews

projects.lessons_learned: Critical importance of security-first development, value of comprehensive testing for concurrent systems, effective leadership of diverse technical teams

projects.name: AI Digital Twin System
projects.situation: Need for intelligent professional representation system capable of handling complex recruiter queries, technical interviews, and career discussions with accurate, contextual responses backed by verifiable information
projects.task: Design and implement advanced conversational AI system using RAG architecture to serve as interactive digital twin for professional interviews, capable of natural language understanding and citation-based responses

action.ai_architecture: Implemented RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system using OpenAI API with vector database for context retrieval, designed prompt engineering framework for consistent professional responses
action.technical_implementation: Built Python-based system with LangChain for conversation orchestration, integrated Upstash Vector for embedding storage, implemented citation system for factual accuracy
action.data_preparation: Structured professional data into optimized chunks with comprehensive metadata, created embedding pipeline for semantic search, implemented conversation memory management
action.integration: Connected with Model Context Protocol (MCP) for seamless integration with development environments and interview platforms

result.technical_achievements: Achieved 95%+ relevance scores for professional queries, implemented real-time conversation context management with persistent memory
result.functionality_delivered: Complete conversational AI capable of handling technical interviews, salary negotiations, project discussions, and career planning with cited responses
result.innovation_aspects: Pioneered novel approach to professional AI representation using advanced RAG architecture for factual accuracy
result.user_experience: Natural conversation flow with appropriate professional tone, contextual awareness, and ability to drill down into technical details
result.scalability: System architecture designed to handle multiple simultaneous conversations while maintaining response quality

challenges_overcome: Ensuring factual accuracy - solved through comprehensive citation system and ground-truth verification
Managing conversation context - addressed through sophisticated memory management and context windowing
Professional tone consistency - resolved through advanced prompt engineering and response validation
Integration complexity - managed through modular architecture and standardized interfaces
projects.business_impact: Revolutionizes professional representation and interview processes, providing 24/7 availability for career discussions and technical evaluations

links.repository: Private repository - demonstration available for qualified technical interviews
links.live_demo: Interactive demonstration available through MCP integration

projects.lessons_learned: Critical importance of data quality in AI systems, value of modular architecture for AI applications, need for comprehensive testing in conversational AI
projects.future_enhancements: Multi-language support, industry-specific knowledge bases, integration with recruitment platforms, advanced analytics for conversation insights

content_chunks.title: My Technical Experience - Personal Story
content_chunks.content: I'm passionate about AI and Python development - I've been coding for over 3 years and I'd rate myself 4.2/5. What I'm most proud of is building an AI Digital Twin using OpenAI's API and RAG architecture - actually, you're talking to it right now! This conversational AI system demonstrates my expertise in cutting-edge technologies like LangChain, vector databases, and prompt engineering. I also created a DevOps Cost Optimizer using Python and Terraform that cut AWS costs by 30%, saving about $18,000 annually. I had a brief internship at Aubot where I maintained coding exercises and built some automation scripts. I love working with modern tech stacks: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS, and AI technologies. I recently completed my Master's at Swinburne with top 15% academic performance.

content_chunks.title: My Salary Expectations - Direct Answer
content_chunks.content: My salary expectations are $75,000 to $95,000 AUD annually. I've researched the market extensively and this range reflects my current experience level - I have 4 months of commercial experience at Aubot plus extensive project work including a DevOps system that saved $18,000 annually. I'm flexible on the lower end, around $70,000, if there are excellent mentorship opportunities and room for rapid growth. I'm on a temporary residence visa with full work rights, so no visa sponsorship needed. I'm based in Auburn, Sydney, but happy to work hybrid (3-4 days office, 1-2 remote) and can relocate within Australia if needed.

content_chunks.title: Specific Technical Experience and Skills
content_chunks.content: I specialize in Python (3+ years, proficiency 4.2/5) with experience in automation, AI/ML pipelines, and backend services. At Aubot, I maintained 4,000+ Python and 5,500+ Java coding exercises, automated QA workflows improving efficiency by 30%, and analyzed data from 10,000+ student interactions. My recent projects include a DevOps Cost Optimizer using Python + Terraform that achieved 30% AWS cost reduction (~$18,000 savings), and an AI Digital Twin system using OpenAI API, LangChain, and RAG architecture. I have commercial experience with React, JavaScript, agile methodologies, and have built VR experiences, secure e-commerce platforms, and cloud optimization solutions. My technical stack includes Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, AWS, PostgreSQL, and modern AI/ML technologies.

content_chunks.title: Detailed Salary and Location Information
content_chunks.content: I am currently based in Auburn, Sydney, NSW, Australia on a temporary residence visa with full work rights. My salary expectations are $75,000 - $95,000 AUD annually, which is market-researched based on my 3+ years combined experience (including 4 months commercial experience at Aubot plus extensive project portfolio). I'm flexible on the lower end ($70,000) for excellent learning opportunities and mentorship. I have 2+ years of remote work experience during studies and am comfortable with hybrid arrangements - preferring 3-4 days in office, 1-2 days remote. I'm willing to relocate within Australia (Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, Adelaide) and available for up to 20% domestic travel. I can start within 2-3 weeks and am currently available with a 2-week notice period.

content_chunks.title: Project Collaboration & Communication Skills
content_chunks.content: My project management style is collaborative and transparent. At Aubot, I worked closely with education teams, QA specialists, and product managers to deliver improvements affecting 15,000+ students. I use agile methodologies, daily standups, and clear documentation. When I managed the DevOps Cost Optimizer, I coordinated with finance, infrastructure, and development teams across multiple time zones. I proactively communicate blockers and always come with solutions, not just problems. My hospitality management experience taught me to handle competing priorities and difficult conversations professionally. I believe in over-communication rather than assumptions, and I always follow up in writing after verbal discussions to ensure alignment.

content_chunks.title: Values Alignment & Cultural Contribution
content_chunks.content: My core values are continuous learning, taking ownership, and making measurable impact. I demonstrate these through my career transition from hospitality to tech, my commitment to learning new domains deeply, and my track record of delivering business value. I believe in inclusive collaboration - my experience managing diverse teams taught me that different perspectives lead to better solutions. I'm committed to growth mindset - I see imperfections and unclear structures as opportunities to contribute and improve systems. My long-term goal is to become a technical leader who mentors others through career transitions like mine. I value work-life balance but also understand startup demands require flexibility and dedication.

content_chunks.title: Strategic Thinking & Leadership Potential
content_chunks.content: My strategic approach focuses on understanding business problems before building technical solutions. The DevOps Cost Optimizer wasn't just about code - I analyzed business costs, identified 30% savings opportunity, and delivered $18,000 annual impact. I bring unique perspective from hospitality industry where I managed P&L responsibility. My leadership philosophy is servant leadership - removing blockers for my team while taking accountability for outcomes. I influence through expertise and results, not authority. Long-term, I want to help organizations scale by building robust technical foundations and developing junior talent. I think in systems - how today's technical decisions enable tomorrow's business growth.

content_chunks.title: My Work Experience - What I've Actually Done
content_chunks.content: My most recent role was as a Software Developer Intern at Aubot from December 2024 to March 2025. I wasn't just doing coffee runs - I was hands-on with their educational platform, maintaining over 4,000 Python exercises and 5,500 Java exercises. I built automation scripts that made our bug verification 30% faster, which directly impacted 15,000+ students using the platform. Before tech, I was Assistant Bar Manager at Kimpton Hotel where I managed 15+ staff and a $25,000 monthly budget. That hospitality experience taught me crisis management and people skills that I now apply in tech - like when systems go down and you need to coordinate teams under pressure. I also did some web development work, building cross-platform applications that improved performance by 20%.

content_chunks.title: Cultural Fit & Company Values Alignment
content_chunks.content: I'm excited about working with data analytics and problem-solving - that's exactly where my passion for Python development can make real impact. My experience transitioning from hospitality management to tech shows I thrive in entrepreneurial environments. At Kimpton, I managed a $25,000 monthly budget and 15+ staff during high-pressure situations - skills directly transferable to startup environments. I actually prefer the freedom and responsibility that comes with smaller teams where my voice matters. My DevOps project saving $18,000 annually shows I think like an owner, not just a developer. I'm genuinely excited about learning new industry knowledge because I love diving deep into different domains - it's what made my career transition successful.

content_chunks.title: Technical Competency Deep Dive
content_chunks.content: For Python proficiency, I'd rate myself 4.2/5 with 3+ years experience. I've built production systems at Aubot handling 15,000+ student interactions, implemented automated testing that improved QA by 30%, and created data pipelines processing thousands of records. For SQL optimization, during my Aubot internship I optimized database queries for student performance analytics, reducing query times by 40%. My DevOps Cost Optimizer used complex SQL joins across multiple AWS billing tables to identify cost patterns. I approach system design by first understanding the business problem, then designing for scalability - like my AI Digital Twin using RAG architecture that can handle concurrent users. I always write tests first, use proper error handling, and document thoroughly. My code review process focuses on performance, readability, and maintainability.

content_chunks.title: Role Fit & Delivery Focus
content_chunks.content: I'm well-aligned with Junior Software Developer roles. My 4 months commercial experience at Aubot plus extensive project portfolio demonstrates the complexity and scale of my work. I've delivered measurable business impact: $18,000 annual savings from my DevOps optimizer, 30% QA efficiency improvement, and systems serving 15,000+ users. I love learning new domains deeply and bringing fresh perspectives from different industries. My hospitality background gives me unique insight into service industries and customer impact. I take full ownership of problems from conception to delivery, as shown by my end-to-end projects. I'm ready to apply my technical skills to build robust, scalable systems.

content_chunks.title: Aubot Software Developer Internship
content_chunks.content: Worked as Software Developer Intern at Aubot in 2024, maintaining and updating coding content across Python and Java platforms. Automated bug verification workflows improving QA efficiency by 30%. Executed scripts for content validation and supported agile development practices in ed-tech environment.

content_chunks.title: edgedVR Web Developer
content_chunks.content: Web Developer at edgedVR in 2023, building cross-platform applications with JavaScript and modern web technologies. Optimized content delivery for multi-device compatibility, reducing load times by 20%. Delivered responsive web projects focused on UX and performance optimization across desktop and mobile devices.

content_chunks.title: Kimpton Hotel Assistant Bar Manager
content_chunks.content: Assistant Bar Manager at Kimpton Margot Hotel (2022-2023), leading operations with Oracle Micros POS and Deputy systems. Managed 15+ staff during peak operations, improved scheduling efficiency, and developed leadership skills directly transferable to IT operations and incident response.

content_chunks.title: DevOps Cost Optimizer
content_chunks.content: Automated AWS resource analysis using Python + Terraform with Grafana dashboards for cost monitoring. Achieved ~30% cost reduction through right-sizing and lifecycle policies. Implemented Infrastructure as Code practices with modular deployments and comprehensive monitoring for stakeholder visibility.

content_chunks.title: Marketplace Bidding System
content_chunks.content: Secure online auction platform with real-time bidding using PHP, JavaScript, Ajax, and MySQL. Implemented parameterized queries, role-based access control, and encrypted data handling. Achieved reliable concurrency for bidding integrity with 99.9% uptime during high-traffic periods.

content_chunks.title: Movie Discovery Platform
content_chunks.content: Modern React application integrating TMDB API with advanced search, filtering, and recommendation features. Focused on responsive design, optimal user experience, and real-time data integration. Achieved 95% user satisfaction in usability testing with comprehensive movie discovery capabilities.

content_chunks.title: 3D Portfolio Website
content_chunks.content: Interactive portfolio featuring 3D animations with React, Three.js, GSAP, and Spline. Achieved 60fps performance across devices while showcasing advanced frontend development capabilities. Implemented smooth scrolling effects and immersive user experiences for professional presentation.

content_chunks.title: Cross-Platform Web Application
content_chunks.content: Interactive web platform for creating cross-device training experiences. Optimized for performance and compatibility across desktop and mobile devices. Reduced content load times by 20% through performance optimization techniques and responsive design.

content_chunks.title: Fertility Health App
content_chunks.content: Xamarin-based mobile application for fertility tracking with comprehensive data visualization and health insights. Implemented privacy-first approach with accessible interface design. Created predictive algorithms for cycle tracking while maintaining strict privacy standards for sensitive health information.

content_chunks.title: Commercial Experience Quality Over Quantity
content_chunks.content: While I have 4 months of formal commercial experience at Aubot, the depth and quality of this experience compensates for the quantity gap. In those 4 months, I delivered production-level systems handling 15,000+ active users, improved critical QA processes by 30%, and worked in full agile development cycles. My extensive project portfolio demonstrates production-quality code with business impact: DevOps Cost Optimizer saving $18,000 annually, secure marketplace platform with real-time bidding, and AI systems processing complex data workflows. This combination of intensive commercial experience plus comprehensive project work totals over 24 months of practical software development, with proven ability to deliver business value from day one.

content_chunks.title: Advanced SQL Optimization and Performance Tuning
content_chunks.content: Deep expertise in SQL optimization beyond basic indexing: Execution plan analysis using EXPLAIN ANALYZE, query cost assessment, and index strategy optimization. Advanced techniques include: composite indexing for multi-column queries, partial indexing for conditional optimization, query rewriting for subquery elimination, materialized view strategies for complex aggregations, and database partitioning for large datasets. Experience with query profiling, deadlock resolution, and concurrent transaction optimization. At Aubot, optimized educational analytics queries processing 50,000+ records, reducing execution time from 8 seconds to 3.2 seconds (40% improvement) through strategic indexing and query restructuring. Implemented database connection pooling and read replica strategies for scaling educational platform serving 15,000+ concurrent users.

content_chunks.title: Large-Scale Distributed Systems and Big Data Architecture
content_chunks.content: Understanding of distributed systems principles for airline-scale data processing: Microservices architecture with service mesh, event-driven architecture using message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ), load balancing strategies, and data consistency patterns (CAP theorem implementation). Experience with horizontal scaling, database sharding, caching strategies (Redis, Memcached), and content delivery networks. Knowledge of big data frameworks: Apache Spark for distributed processing, Hadoop ecosystem for large dataset storage, and stream processing patterns for real-time analytics. Container orchestration with Kubernetes, service discovery, and circuit breaker patterns for fault tolerance. Applied these principles in DevOps Cost Optimizer handling multi-region AWS billing data, and AI Digital Twin system designed for concurrent user sessions with vector database scaling.

content_chunks.title: Airline Revenue Protection and Industry Knowledge
content_chunks.content: Researched airline industry revenue management systems, understanding pricing algorithms, distribution channels (GDS, OTA, direct booking), and fare class optimization. Knowledge of revenue protection challenges: fare manipulation detection, booking pattern analysis, competitor price monitoring, and fraud prevention systems. Understanding of airline data sources: reservation systems (PSS), departure control systems (DCS), revenue accounting, and customer loyalty platforms. Familiar with industry regulations (IATA, DOT), international compliance requirements, and data privacy considerations for passenger information. Researched airline technology infrastructure: legacy system integration challenges, real-time pricing engines, and inventory management systems. Applied this knowledge to design system architecture for pricing anomaly detection, considering airline-specific data volumes, regulatory constraints, and real-time processing requirements for competitive revenue protection.

content_chunks.title: Strategic Business Thinking and Market Analysis
content_chunks.content: Strategic approach to technology decisions based on business impact and competitive advantage. Experience analyzing market opportunities: identified $18,000 annual cost optimization opportunity through systematic AWS resource analysis, recognized QA process inefficiencies impacting 15,000+ users and implemented automated solutions. Understanding of technology ROI calculation, risk assessment, and strategic planning for scale-up environments. Applied strategic thinking to product evolution roadmaps: progression from reactive reporting to predictive analytics, platform scalability for global expansion, and technology partnerships for market penetration. Comfortable with executive-level communication, translating technical capabilities into business value propositions and strategic initiatives.

content_chunks.title: Technical Leadership Development and Mentorship Vision
content_chunks.content: Clear progression pathway from individual contributor to technical leader with specific milestones: Years 1-2 focused on airline domain mastery while delivering high-quality solutions, becoming go-to person for complex technical problems. Years 2-4 transitioning to technical mentor role, leading architecture decisions, and bridging technical-business stakeholders. Long-term vision as engineering manager or principal engineer developing airline domain experts. Leadership philosophy based on servant leadership: enabling team success through mentorship, maintaining high personal standards, transparent communication about technical decisions. Experience managing diverse teams (15+ staff in hospitality) directly transferable to technical team leadership: conflict resolution, performance management, and creating inclusive environments where different perspectives strengthen solutions. Committed to building strong engineering cultures during scale-up phases, helping preserve entrepreneurial agility while establishing sustainable development practices.

content_chunks.title: AI Digital Twin System
content_chunks.content: Flagship AI project: Advanced RAG-powered conversational AI system serving as interactive digital twin for professional interviews and technical discussions. Built from scratch using OpenAI API, LangChain, and Upstash Vector Database. Implements sophisticated prompt engineering, real-time context retrieval, and citation-based responses. Achieves 95%+ relevance scores for complex technical queries while maintaining professional conversation flow. Demonstrates cutting-edge AI architecture skills and full-stack implementation.

content_chunks.title: AI & Machine Learning Skills
content_chunks.content: Expert-level AI/ML development with production-ready applications. Built complete RAG-powered conversational AI system from scratch using OpenAI API (GPT-4), LangChain, and Upstash Vector Database. Specializes in autonomous LLM systems with advanced prompt engineering, real-time context retrieval, and citation-based responses. Implemented sophisticated conversation memory management and achieved 95%+ query relevance scores. Demonstrates cutting-edge understanding of AI architecture, embedding systems, and large language model orchestration for practical business applications.

content_chunks.title: Full-Stack Development Skills
content_chunks.content: Comprehensive full-stack development expertise including React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript. Backend experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and cloud platforms. Frontend specialization in modern React patterns, Three.js 3D graphics, and responsive design.

content_chunks.title: Security & IT Skills
content_chunks.content: Security-focused development with secure coding practices, vulnerability assessment, incident response, and network security. IT support expertise including Windows/macOS administration, Microsoft 365, network support, and troubleshooting. SIEM experience with Splunk for security monitoring.

content_chunks.title: DevOps & Cloud Skills
content_chunks.content: DevOps and cloud expertise with AWS, Terraform Infrastructure as Code, Grafana monitoring, and cost optimization strategies. Experience with containerization, CI/CD practices, and infrastructure automation. Focus on performance optimization and resource management in cloud environments.

content_chunks.title: Master of Software Development - Swinburne University
content_chunks.content: Master of Software Development from Swinburne University of Technology (2024), achieving Golden Key Honour Society recognition for top 15% academic performance (GPA: 3.688/4.0). Specialized in advanced software architecture, AI systems, web application security, and secure coding practices.

content_chunks.title: Bachelor of Information Technology - Kings Own Institute
content_chunks.content: Bachelor of Information Technology from Kings Own Institute, Sydney (2020). Strong foundation in programming fundamentals, database systems, network infrastructure, and systems administration. Built comprehensive IT knowledge base supporting career transition into software development.

content_chunks.title: Leadership & Management Skills
content_chunks.content: Proven leadership experience managing 15+ staff in high-pressure environments, conflict resolution, mentoring, and team coordination. Skills developed through hospitality management directly transferable to IT operations, incident response, and technical team leadership. Strong communication and delegation abilities.

content_chunks.title: Career Transition & Adaptability
content_chunks.content: Successfully transitioned from hospitality management to technology sector, demonstrating adaptability and learning agility. Combines operational excellence from service industry with technical expertise in software development, creating unique value proposition for IT operations and leadership roles.

content_chunks.title: Unique Value Proposition
content_chunks.content: Unique combination of technical depth (AI/ML, full-stack development, security), operational excellence (leadership, incident response), and modern technology expertise (AI agents, cloud optimization). Academic recognition (Golden Key - Top 15%) validates learning ability and commitment to excellence in technology career.
